name: Protobelt Enchant
active: Fire Bolt: Dash forward and unleash a cone of missiles that deal magic damage (40 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Ability Power. Active effect: Dash forward and unleash a cone of missiles that deal magic damage (40 second cooldown).. A versatile item that can benefit many champion types.
tips: Perfect for champions who rely heavily on abilities
The cooldown reduction/ability haste maximizes spell uptime
Synergizes well with champions who have low cooldowns
